name: King for a while
description:
A small game jam project. A pvp game play with a simple stone-scissors-paper battle mechanic. Try to optimise your troops' usage better than your opponent and reach his castle. Rules: 

  • Dragons beat knights
  • Knights beat archers
  • Archers beat dragons

I've developed this project during a two day game jam together with artist colleagues.

Unfortunately, webgl version requires some fixes for network code for what I don't really have time for. So only the downloadable version is available now.
